name: Aphaia
goal: Aphaia are experts in EU ICT regulation with the focus on electronic communications (telecomunications) and data protection regulation.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: electronic communications, NGA infrastructure, media, data protection, GDPR, ePrivacy, Data Protection
